task_completion.description: Whether the given task is completed or not.

valid_actions.description: The number of valid actions taken during the task

invalid_actions.description: The number of invalid actions taken during the task

efficiency.description: The ratio of valid actions to total actions taken

task_understanding.description: The level of understanding of the task and its goals.

planning.description: The ability to plan and strategize the steps to achieve the goal.

environment_interaction.description: The ability to correctly interact with the environment and use its objects.

termination.description: Whether 'TERMINATE' is used correctly in solving or giving up the task.
